sourcesContent:
import React, {useState} from 'react' import { useNavigate, Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Button, Row, Col, ListGroup, Image, Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Message from '../components/Message' import CheckoutSteps from '../components/CheckoutSteps' function PlaceOrderScreen() { const cart = useSelector( state => state.cart) cart.itemPrice = cart.cartItems.reduce((acc, item) => acc + item.price * item.qty, 0).toFixed(2) cart.shippingPrice = (cart.itemPrice < 100 ? 200 : ( Number(cart.itemPrice) * 0.05)).toFixed(2) cart.taxPrice = 0.00 cart.totalPrice = Number((cart.itemPrice + cart.shippingPrice + cart.taxPrice)).toFixed(2) const placeOrderHandler = () => { } return (

Shipping

Shipping: {cart.shippingAddress.address}, {cart.shippingAddress.city}, {' '} {cart.shippingAddress.postalCode} {' '} {cart.shippingAddress.country}

Payment Method

Method: {cart.paymentMethod}

Order Items (Edit Cart)

{cart.cartItems.length === 0 ? Oops! Looks like your cart is empty. Go add something o ska reka moya : ( {cart.cartItems.map((item, index) => ( {item.name} {item.qty} X M {item.price} = {(item.qty * item.price).toFixed(2)} ))} )}

Order Summmery

 Items: M {cart.itemPrice} Shipping: M {cart.shippingPrice} Tax: M {cart.taxPrice} Total: M {cart.totalPrice}
) } export default PlaceOrderScreen
